response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1,500,000 to you. I understand your financial considerations, and after careful evaluation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a fair return for us. I believe this price reflects the quality and significance of the product, and I hope it aligns with your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 1350000}
